tracks.text: A letter M stands in a spotlight. It explodes into a rainbow of confetti. Media Factory.
A silver phoenix erupts in fire and circles of bronze light. Kadowkawa Video.
On a white background, the outline of a purple logo forms. A flaming phoenix surrounded by the words Kadokawa Pictures, Inc.
Light streams through a stained glass.
The bishop holds a crystal
Nigun, the scarred soldier, kneels
Nigun's eyes glow
Light shimmers. A ringed skeleton hand reach out.
Ains stands, wearing a cape that blows in the wind.
Gold text, Overlord
A hoard of skeletons shuffles through a mist
Nazarick, day time. Ains sits, one hand resting against his face, the other holding the staff.
Albedo lies, her white dress emphasizing her slender waist. Black wings wrap around her bare hips.
Aura backflips. Mare holds a staff.
Demiurge adjusts his tie. He wears a red suit and glasses. He has a long, metal tail.
Cocytus, a humanoid insect, exhales frost.
Sebas bows, a hand over his chest.
Shaltear, wearing a black dress with red ribbon twirls, holding a black parasol. She has white hair and red eyes.
Momonga walks down a carpet, depicting animatd scenes. Enri and Nemu.
A warrior woman. 4 men smile and embrace.
An old woman and a boy with concealed eyes.
General Gazef and the Vice Captain look determined.
Nigun smiles.
A woman with red eyes and a bald man smile.
A blue haired man readies a sword.
A dozen people pose dramatically
Momonga laughs
A hamster runs.
Ains in black armor and Naberal in a cape fly through the air
Surrounded by monsters, the black armored soldier swings a sword. Naberal raises a hand and fires a beam of lightning.
Aura pulls Mare onto the back of a wolf demon
Armored Albedo spins an axe in Carne village
Cocytus stands on ice, holding an axe and staring at humanoid reptiles
Sebas raises a fist in an alley
Demiurge spreads wings in front of a full moon
Ains flashes between wearing a cloak, the black armor, and the mage robe.
Albedo sheds a tear
Shaltear wears red armor and flies by white wings. She exchanges blows with Ains in a red sky.
Ains takes a flag pole from Albedo. He raises the flag of Momonga, standing on a cliff with the residents of Nazarick.
Text, Chapter 4, Ruler of Death
A soldier stands with a glowing orb and a white, floating angel.
He kneels
A wooden carving
He mounts
The soldiers ride forward
Gazef strings a bow'
He fires. It flies towards a Slain soldier, and runs into a green barrier.
He pulls his sword. The soldier holds out a hand, forming a magic circle. Gazef's horse rears and throws him
An angel dives for him
The sword gets stuck in the angel's neck. It falls back.
The angel floats on golden light wings and wields a gold light sword
A line slices across the angel's stomach. It splits in half.
More angels appear
The cavalry rides away
The Slain soldiers turn and conjure magic circles. 2 horses rear and throw Re-Estize soldiers
Angels cut down soldiers
A larger, more gold angel floats over Nigun
Gazef charges
6 angels
6 slices cut each angel in half
He cuts down another angel.
He leaps in the air and spins like a tornado
The angels around him erupt into gold mist
More angels rise
The villagers gather in the Chieftain's house.
Enri holds Nemu
Dozens of angels float above Gazef
Slane soldiers fire bolts of light
They strike Gazef. He coughs blood.
The angels dive. He swings. An angel strikes from behind.
He cuts down several more. An angel stabs him in the back.
He grits his teeth and clutches his sword.
He stands
Gazef stands in the chieftain's house
He pulls the wood carving out of his pocket. It disappears.
Gazef collapses
The wind sweeps across the grass of the battle field. It blows Ains's cloak.
Angels float. Nigun stares.
Ains wears the red mask.
The sun sets over the horizon. To the north, a hoard of angels floats above the Slane soldiers. In the south, Ains stands.
2 angels stab Ains in the chest
Ains holds the angels' heads.
Nigun sweats
Ains drives the angels into the ground.
A dome of dark energy forms around Ains and expands. The angels disappear on contact.
Nigun stares
Slane soldiers form magic circles and fire beams of various colors
A soldier fires a slingshot. Albedo leaps in front of Ains and bats the stone away. The firing soldier's head disappears
The golden angel holds out its hand and conjures a mace.
It floats to Ains and swings. The mace has a glowing, throbbing orb in the center. Ains holds up a hand, stopping the swing.
A small marble of crimson fire forms at the end of his finger. It slowly wanders forward, touches, and then instantly consumes the angel
He pulls a crystal out of his pocket
She spins her axe and stands in front of Ains
A light spans from the crystal. A 20 foot angel appears, spreading wide 3 pairs of white wings. It holds a gold staff, and a magic circle forms in front of its face.
Ains facepalms
The super angel's gold staff crumbles into gold stones
Gold stones float in a circle around the angel. Its forehead magic circle glows, and a pillar of brilliant light descends from the heavens, striking Ains.
Nigun gapes. Albedo shakes.
He steps forward
A dark orb forms in front of the super angel.
It crackles. Wind, debris, then the angel spin into the orb. The world turns black and white, and the orb disappears, leaving only the night.
For a moment, the sky shatters like glass
Ains removes his mask, revealing his bare skull. Nigun's eyes go wide as he screams.
The throne room
The Momonga flag burns
Albedo stands with long, loose hair. Black feathers float around her.
She holds her hands to her face and smiles.
Her eyes are yellow with black slits down the center. Her eyes glow.
A silvery spider web glistens, stretching between torn red ribbons.
The ribbons entwine around her body, lying prone. Her legs are parted
She looks up, her arms spread, her black hair lying messily across a checkered floor.
In the style of metallic water color, she stands against a mirror, a hand covering her face
While her dress is white with gold spider web trim, her reflection wears a low cut black dress
A black feather lands on water.
Albedo stands, her arms spread behind her back, pushing her chest forward. Her black wings, rooted at her lower back, spread out. Each with is twice as long as an arm.

Her dress is white, with off the shoulder sleeves, and a gold lining around her hips. The dress continues down from her stomach and back, leaving her hips bare. The dress is lined in ruffles down her legs. She wears gloves with ruffles that stretch up to her biceps.
Albedo stands, wrapping an arm over one shoulder, and another arm around her waist. She wears a white collar with gold lining from the base of her head to just below her collar.
Albedo stares forward. Her image flickers and distorts.
Text, next episode preview
